Purpose: To empower financial advisors with AI-driven, context-aware investment insights leveraging RAG over market and portfolio data, improving advisory quality and client engagement.
ExecSummary: Financial advisors face increasing client demands for personalized, data-driven advice amidst volatile markets and growing data complexity. Traditional methods are often reactive and siloed. This demo showcases an AI assistant that integrates real-time market data, portfolio analytics, and client context to generate actionable investment insights, improving advisory efficiency and client satisfaction.
ExecSummaryKeyAsks: Improve client engagement with data-driven recommendations
BusinessObjectives: Enhance advisor productivity through AI augmentation
Increase client satisfaction by offering personalized recommendations
Reduce time spent on data aggregation and manual analysis
Support compliance and risk management with transparent AI outputs
BusinessBenefits: Improved portfolio performance via timely insights
Scalable advisory services with consistent quality
overview: This demo implements an AI-powered financial advisory assistant that uses semantic search with Faiss and GPT-Neo generative models, integrated via Flask APIs, to provide contextual, real-time investment insights based on client portfolios and market data.
business: The financial advisory industry is rapidly transforming with digital tools to meet client demands for personalized advice. AI-driven contextual analysis over diverse data sources is essential to deliver differentiated advisory services, reduce operational overhead, and comply with regulatory requirements.
approach: The solution employs LangGraph to orchestrate multi-agent workflows, Faiss for vector similarity search over historical market and portfolio data, and GPT-Neo for natural language generation of insights and recommendations. Agents interact through a shared contextual memory to maintain client context and portfolio state.
BusinessDrivers: Demand for personalized, real-time investment advice
Need to process large volumes of complex market data
Pressure to reduce advisory operational costs
BusinessChallanges: Data silos hindering holistic portfolio analysis
Advisor overload due to manual data synthesis
Rapid market changes requiring quick, accurate responses
Maintaining client trust with transparent AI recommendations
FunctionalOverview: Portfolio Data Aggregation: Collect and normalize client portfolio and market data.
Contextual Insight Generation: Generate investment insights based on portfolio context and market trends.
Natural Language Advisory: Provide advisors with easy-to-understand reports and recommendations.
Client Query Handling: Support advisor queries about portfolio performance and market outlook.
Contextual Memory: Maintain client interaction context across sessions.

FunctionalComponentDetails.Description: Aggregates client portfolio holdings, transactions, and market data to create a unified view for analysis.
KeyFeatures: Support for multiple data formats and sources

FunctionalComponentDetails.Description: Leverages Faiss semantic search and GPT-Neo to generate actionable investment insights tailored to client portfolios.
KeyFeatures: Semantic retrieval of relevant market trends and historical data
Natural language generation of analysis and recommendations
BusinessImpact: Improves quality and relevance of advice

FunctionalComponentDetails.Description: Enables interactive querying and generates detailed reports for client advisory sessions.

SolutionOverview: AI-driven advisory assistant powered by GPT-Neo and Faiss
Flask API backend for integration with advisory platforms
Contextual memory store for client and portfolio state
Interactive natural language interface for advisors
dataflow: Client portfolio and market data are ingested by the Portfolio Aggregation Agent, normalized, and stored. The Insight Generation Agent uses Faiss for semantic similarity and GPT-Neo for generating insights, which are then accessible via the Query & Reporting Agent. All agents share state through contextual memory for coherent advisory interactions.
design: Agents are containerized microservices orchestrated by LangGraph. They interact indirectly through a contextual memory layer backed by a vector store and a knowledge graph. The system supports scaling, fault tolerance, and seamless integration with advisor frontends.
